properties.name: senderID
properties.description: Maps to the project number in the Google Developer Console.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: The name of a drawable resource to use as the small-icon. The name shouldnot include the extension.

properties.name: iconColor
properties.description: Sets the background color of the small icon on Android 5.0 and greater.[Supported Formats](http://developer.android.com/intl/ru/reference/android/graphics/Color.html#parseColor(java.lang.String))

properties.name: sound
properties.description: If true it plays the sound specified in the push data or the default systemsound.

properties.name: vibrate
properties.description: If true the device vibrates on receipt of notification.

properties.name: clearBadge
properties.description: If true the icon badge will be cleared on init and before push messages are processed.

properties.name: clearNotifications
properties.description: If true the app clears all pending notifications when it is closed.

properties.name: forceShow
properties.description: If true will always show a notification, even when the app is on theforeground.

properties.name: topics
properties.description: If the array contains one or more strings each string will be used tosubscribe to a GcmPubSub topic.
